snippet: Shintaro Ishihara, a novelist turned political firebrand, has emerged as a contender for prime minister and promises to restore Japan’s battered national pride.
abstract: Shintaro Ishihara, Japanese novelist turned right-wing firebrand, is leading newly formed populist party and has emerged as contender for prime minister, vowing to turn Japan into more independent, possibly nuclear-armed nation.
lead_paragraph: Shintaro Ishihara, a novelist turned political firebrand, has emerged as a contender for prime minister and promises to restore Japan’s battered national pride.

headline.seo: Shintaro Ishihara, Right-Wing Japanese Politician, Makes Gains
headline.main: A Fringe Politician Moves to Japan’s National Stage
headline.print_headline: A Fringe Politician Moves to Japan’s National Stage
